item.description:
Our legislative environmental allies need your help in the upcoming election!

Recent studies have shown that voter turnout among traditional environmental voters has fallen considerably. To help change this, we'll be calling Sierra Club members across the state reminding them to vote and telling them who their endorsed candidates are. With so many of our allies facing serious challenges, we need your help more than ever.

Bring your own cellphone - we'll supply calling lists and snacks.

Home-based calling is also welcome!

View a list of Sierra Club endorsed candidates at http://www.sierraclub...

group.name: Greater Boston Sierra Club Environmental Meetup Group

item.name: Phone Banks to Support Sierra Club Endorsed Candidates
